item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:2, topic:394669”][code=php]function getLevelForXP($xp) {
$query = mysql_query(“SELECT * FROM skills ORDER BY lvl110 DESC”) or die(mysql_error());

	$row = mysql_fetch_array($query);

$lvl110 = $row[“lvl110”];

$lvl =1;
if(!$xp || $xp==0) $xp = 1;

while($xp > $output){
	$points = $points + floor($lvl + 300 * pow(2, ($lvl / 7)));
	$output = floor($points / 4);
	if($lvl > 99 && $lvl110 == 0){
		return 99;
		break;
	} else if($lvl > 99 && $lvl110 == 1){
		return $lvl;
		break;
	} else if($xp > 13034431 && $lvl110 == 0){
		return 99;
		break;
	} else if($xp < 83){
		return 1;
		break;		
	} else if($output >= $xp){
		return $lvl;
		break;
	}
	$lvl++;
}

}[/code]

May be wrong, but try it[/quote]
Hmm, it stayed at level 99 for everyone, but when I changed one person’s lvl110 to 1, it made everyone with a 99 to level 100.
